# scrollToItem

Scrolls to the specified element inside the container.

## Parameters

| Param                | Type       | Description                                    |
| -------------------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| container            | `Element`  | the containing element.                        |
| element              | `Element`  | the element to scroll.                         |
| options              | `Object`   | the scroll options.                            |
| options.headerHeight | `number`   | the height of the header.                      |
| options.duration     | `number`   | the duration of the animation, default: 150ms. |
| options.done         | `function` | invoked after scrolling.                       |

## Example

```js
import {useCallback} from 'react';
import {scrollToItem} from '@bluecateng/pelagos';

const Example = () => {
	const handleClick = useCallback(
		() => scrollToItem(document.getElementById('container'), document.getElementById('other')),
		[]
	);
	return <button onClick={handleClick}>...</button>;
};
```
